snippet.title: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special - Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now on Steam & PlayStation4!
ESRB Rating: TEEN with Fantasy Violence, Suggestive Themes
https://store.steampowered.com/app/663130/
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1056-CUSA09738_00-GAMETENGOKUUS000

Game Tengoku - The Game Paradise! is Jaleco's self-parody-filled shooting game, full of tongue-in-cheek references to video game tropes, off-beat humour and sociopathic pigs.
Originally released in 1995, and upgraded for its console debut in 1997, the original developers have got back together to bring the ultimate revival to PlayStation 4 and Steam.

*TATSUJIN DLC only available with PlayStation4 limited edition.

Official Home Page: https://gameparadise2017.com/en/index.html
©TATSUJIN Co., Ltd. ©TOAPLAN Co., Ltd.
